original_text: After Moses had sent spies to Jazer, the Israelites captured its surrounding settlements and drove out the Amorites who were there.
korean_text: 모세가 또 사람을 보내어 야셀을 정탐하게 하고 그 촌락들을 빼앗고 그 곳에 있던 아모리인을 몰아 내었더라

sentences.original_text: After Moses had sent spies to Jazer
the Israelites captured its surrounding settlements
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들이 그 주위의 정착지들을 점령했고
